Author: paulgb
Title: Radiohead's MP3 release just a tactic to boost CD sales. So much for dethroning the industy giants.

Author: pg
Content:
Everyone does this. There's nothing wrong it. Generalizing from experience is part of intelligence.

Maybe the reason you seem to notice it more with startups is that there's a lot of variation in startups, so generalizations more often miss.

Author: aswanson
Content: On the other hand, many lawns were well-maintained and assorted yard projects completed.

Author: samwise
Content: This is great news, "the more girls the better" -Albert Einstein
